name: yours truly, yeti
description:
yours truly, yeti

a visual novel about winding up in a forest and making some new friends

made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2021

Credits:
  • Art and Graphic Design - Libby @libbyberrie
  • Writing and Programming - Ruqiyah @pettyantics
  • Sound Design and Voice Acting - Andrew J Ryan @ajryanaudio
  • Voice Acting - Naomi Rameaux
